00037 
00042 Assembly::Assembly(Assembly& assembly)
00043 {
00044         if (assembly.m_origin == NULL)
00045         {
00046                 //if assembly is original, set origin pointer
00047                 m_origin = &assembly;
00048         }
00049         else
00050         {
00051                 //else set same origin, is clone from clone
00052                 m_origin = assembly.m_origin;
00053         }
00054 
00055         m_x       = assembly.m_x;
00056         m_y       = assembly.m_y;
00057         m_z       = assembly.m_z;
00058         m_phi     = assembly.m_phi;
00059         m_theta   = assembly.m_theta;
00060         m_rho     = assembly.m_rho;
00061         m_scale_x = assembly.m_scale_x;
00062         m_scale_y = assembly.m_scale_y;
00063         m_scale_z = assembly.m_scale_z;
00064         m_width   = assembly.m_width;
00065         m_height  = assembly.m_height;
00066         m_depth   = assembly.m_depth;
00067         m_type    = assembly.m_type;
00068         m_name    = assembly.m_name;
00069         m_parent  = assembly.m_parent;
00070         m_radius_bottom = assembly.m_radius_bottom;
00071         m_radius_middle = assembly.m_radius_middle;
00072         m_radius_top    = assembly.m_radius_top;
00073         m_dl_object     = assembly.m_dl_object;
00074         m_dl_shadow     = assembly.m_dl_shadow;
00075         m_md5_obj_xml   = assembly.m_md5_obj_xml;
00076 
00077         // copy the children
00078         for (list<Assembly*>::const_iterator it = m_part.begin(); it != m_part.end(); ++it)
00079         {
00080                 // draw the Child
00081                 Assembly* a_copy = new Assembly(wxT("Kopie"));
00082                 (*a_copy) = (**it);
00083                 addPart(a_copy);
00084 
00085                 // set Child-Material
00086                 map<const Assembly* const, Material>::const_iterator it_mat = m_child_mat.find(*it);
00087                 if (it_mat != m_child_mat.end())
00088                 {
00089                         Material a_mat = it_mat->second;
00090                         setChildMaterial(a_copy, a_mat);
00091                 }
00092         }
00093 
00094         // copy the tags
00095         for (list<wxString>::const_iterator it_tags = m_tags.begin(); it_tags != m_tags.end(); ++it_tags)
00096         {
00097                 wxString a_tag = (*it_tags);
00098                 addTag(a_tag);
00099         }
00100 }
00101 
00106 Assembly* Assembly::clone()
00107 {
00108         Assembly* m_clone = new Assembly(wxT("Kopie"));
00109 
00110         if (m_origin == NULL)
00111         {
00112                 //if assembly is original, set origin pointer
00113                 m_clone->m_origin = this;
00114         }
00115         else
00116         {
00117                 //else set same origin, is clone from clone
00118                 m_clone->m_origin = m_origin;
00119         }
00120 
00121         m_clone->m_x             = m_x;
00122         m_clone->m_y             = m_y;
00123         m_clone->m_z             = m_z;
00124         m_clone->m_phi           = m_phi;
00125         m_clone->m_theta         = m_theta;
00126         m_clone->m_rho           = m_rho;
00127         m_clone->m_scale_x       = m_scale_x;
00128         m_clone->m_scale_y       = m_scale_y;
00129         m_clone->m_scale_z       = m_scale_z;
00130         m_clone->m_width         = m_width;
00131         m_clone->m_height        = m_height;
00132         m_clone->m_depth         = m_depth;
00133         m_clone->m_type          = m_type;
00134         m_clone->m_name          = m_name;
00135         m_clone->m_parent        = m_parent;
00136         m_clone->m_radius_bottom = m_radius_bottom;
00137         m_clone->m_radius_middle = m_radius_middle;
00138         m_clone->m_radius_top    = m_radius_top;
00139         m_clone->m_dl_object     = m_dl_object;
00140         m_clone->m_dl_shadow     = m_dl_shadow;
00141         m_clone->m_md5_obj_xml   = m_md5_obj_xml;
00142 
00143         // copy the children
00144         for (list<Assembly*>::const_iterator it = m_part.begin(); it != m_part.end(); ++it)
00145         {
00146                 // draw the Child
00147                 Assembly* a_copy = (*it)->clone();
00148                 m_clone->addPart(a_copy);
00149 
00150                 // set Child-Material
00151                 map<const Assembly* const, Material>::const_iterator it_mat = m_child_mat.find(*it);
00152                 if (it_mat != m_child_mat.end())
00153                 {
00154                         Material a_mat = it_mat->second;
00155                         m_clone->setChildMaterial(a_copy, a_mat);
00156                 }
00157         }
00158 
00159         // copy the tags
00160         for (list<wxString>::const_iterator it_tags = m_tags.begin(); it_tags != m_tags.end(); ++it_tags)
00161         {
00162                 wxString a_tag = (*it_tags);
00163                 m_clone->addTag(a_tag);
00164         }
00165 
00166         return m_clone;
00167 }

00208 Assembly::~Assembly()
00209 {
00210         for (list<Assembly*>::iterator it = m_part.begin(); it != m_part.end(); ++it)
00211         {
00212                 //delete child
00213                 delete *it;
00214         }
00215 
00216         //kill partlist and childlists
00217         m_part.clear();
00218         m_child_dl.clear();
00219         m_child_mat.clear();
00220 }

00453 Assembly* Assembly::getMaster() const
00454 {
00455         Assembly* master = m_parent;
00456 
00457         //while parent exists and type is not ROOT,
00458         // SELECTED, HIDDEN or TRASH, move upwards
00459         while (master->m_parent != NULL && master->m_parent->m_type > IS_TRASH)
00460         {
00461                 master = master->m_parent;
00462         }
00463 
00464         //return master pointer
00465         return master;
00466 }
00467 
00472 bool Assembly::isSelected() const
00473 {
00474         Assembly* parent = m_parent;
00475 
00476         //while parent exists and type is not ROOT,
00477         // move upwards and head for selected container
00478         while (parent->m_parent != NULL && parent->m_parent->m_type != IS_SELECTED)
00479         {
00480                 parent = parent->m_parent;
00481         }
00482 
00483         //return true, if parent type = selected
00484         return (parent->m_parent != NULL && parent->m_parent->m_type == IS_SELECTED);
00485 }

00501 float Assembly::getMaximumSize() const
00502 {
00503         float max = m_height;
00504         if (m_width > max)
00505         {
00506                 max = m_width;
00507         }
00508         if (m_depth > max)
00509         {
00510                 max = m_depth;
00511         }
00512         return max;
00513 }

00638 void Assembly::setCone(const float x,const float y,const float z, const float height, const float r_top, const float r_bottom)
00639 {
00640         m_x = x;
00641         m_y = y;
00642         m_z = z;
00643 
00644         m_radius_top    = r_top;
00645         m_radius_middle = (r_top+r_bottom)/2.0;
00646         m_radius_bottom = r_bottom;
00647 
00648         if (r_top > r_bottom)
00649         {
00650                 m_width = r_top*2.0;
00651         }
00652         else
00653         {
00654                 m_width = r_bottom*2.0;
00655         }
00656 
00657         m_height = height;
00658         m_depth  = m_width;
00659 }
00660 
00661 void Assembly::setCylinder(const float x,const float y,const float z, const float height, const float radius)
00662 {
00663         m_x = x;
00664         m_y = y;
00665         m_z = z;
00666 
00667         m_radius_top    = radius;
00668         m_radius_middle = radius;
00669         m_radius_bottom = radius;
00670 
00671         m_height = height;
00672         m_depth  = radius*2.0;
00673         m_width  = m_depth;
00674 }

00676 void Assembly::setSphere(const float x,const float y,const float z, const float radius)
00677 {
00678         m_x = x;
00679         m_y = y;
00680         m_z = z;
00681 
00682         m_radius_top    = 0.0;
00683         m_radius_middle = radius;
00684         m_radius_bottom = 0.0;
00685 
00686         m_height = radius*2.0;
00687         m_depth  = m_height;
00688         m_width  = m_height;
00689 }

00890 void Assembly::move(const Vertex& center)

00998 void Assembly::setNormals()
00999 {
01000         // set normals on own faces
01001         for (list<Face>::iterator it = m_face.begin(); it != m_face.end(); ++it)
01002         {
01003                 it->setNormal();
01004         }
01005 
01006         // let children set their normals
01007         for (list<Assembly*>::iterator it = m_part.begin(); it != m_part.end(); ++it)
01008         {
01009                 (*it)->setNormals();
01010         }
01011 }

01018 void Assembly::setChildDisplayList(const Assembly* child, const GLuint& dl)

01020         m_child_dl.insert(pair<const Assembly*, GLuint>(child, dl));
01021 }
01022 
01027 void Assembly::draw()
01028 {
01029         //if hidden, abort draw
01030         if (!m_visible)
01031         {
01032                 return;
01033         }
01034 
01035         //start drawing glow colors on selection
01036         if (m_type == IS_ATOMIC)
01037         {
01038                 //if its an atomic part, set name
01039                 glLoadName((int)this);
01040         }
01041         else if (m_parent != NULL)
01042         {
01043                 float glowcolor[4] = {0.0,0.0,0.0,0.0};
01044 
01045                 //if selected paint in different colors
01046                 if (m_parent->m_type == IS_SELECTED)
01047                 {
01048                         if (m_type != IS_GROUP)
01049                         {
01050                                 //paint blue glowing
01051                                 glowcolor[0] = 0.0;
01052                                 glowcolor[1] = 0.0;
01053                                 glowcolor[2] = 1.0;
01054                                 glowcolor[3] = 1.0;
01055                         }
01056 
01057                         if (m_type == IS_GROUP)
01058                         {
01059                                 //paint blue glowing
01060                                 glowcolor[0] = 1.0;
01061                                 glowcolor[1] = 0.0;
01062                                 glowcolor[2] = 0.0;
01063                                 glowcolor[3] = 1.0;
01064                         }
01065 
01066                         //if parent type group or selected, draw square on floor
01067                         if (glowcolor[3] > 0.0)
01068                         {
01069                                 glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT, GL_EMISSION, glowcolor);
01070                                 glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT, GL_AMBIENT, glowcolor);
01071                         }
01072                 }
01073                 else if (m_parent->m_type == IS_ROOT)
01074                 {
01075                         //reset glow value for objects in root
01076                         glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT, GL_EMISSION, glowcolor);
01077                         glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT, GL_AMBIENT, glowcolor);
01078                 }
01079         }
01080 
01081         glPushMatrix();
01082         {
01083                 //first translate to position
01084                 glTranslatef(m_x, m_y, m_z);
01085 
01086                 //rotate in object center
01087                 glRotatef(m_phi, 1, 0, 0);
01088                 glRotatef(m_theta, 0, 1, 0);
01089                 glRotatef(m_rho, 0, 0, 1);
01090 
01091                 //finally scale on place
01092                 glScalef(m_scale_x, m_scale_y, m_scale_z);
01093 
01094                 if (glIsList(m_dl_object))
01095                 {
01096                         //call display list of objects
01097                         glCallList(m_dl_object);
01098                 }
01099                 else
01100                 {
01101                         //create new display list for myself
01102                         m_dl_object = glGenLists(1);
01103 
01104                         //setup new display list
01105                         glNewList(m_dl_object,GL_COMPILE);
01106                         {
01107                                 // draw myself to display list
01108                                 for (list<Face>::const_iterator it = m_face.begin(); it != m_face.end(); ++it)
01109                                 {
01110                                         it->draw();
01111                                 }
01112                         }
01113                         glEndList();
01114                 }
01115 
01116                 // draw the children
01117                 for (list<Assembly*>::const_iterator it = m_part.begin(); it != m_part.end(); ++it)
01118                 {
01119                         // set Child-Material
01120                         map<const Assembly* const, Material>::iterator it_mat = m_child_mat.find(*it);
01121                         if (it_mat != m_child_mat.end())
01122                         {
01123                                 it_mat->second.set();
01124                         }
01125 
01126                         // draw the Child
01127                         (*it)->draw();
01128                 }
01129         }
01130         glPopMatrix();
01131 }
01132 
01137 bool Assembly::findCloneOf(const Assembly* origin) const
01138 {
01139         //search for the clone of origin
01140         for (list<Assembly*>::const_iterator it = m_part.begin(); it != m_part.end(); ++it)
01141         {
01142                 if (origin == (*it)->getOrigin())
01143                 {
01144                         return true;
01145                 }
01146         }
01147         return false;
01148 }
01149 
01154 bool Assembly::findHash(const wxString& hash) const
01155 {
01156         //search for the same hash and return
01157         for (list<Assembly*>::const_iterator it = m_part.begin(); it != m_part.end(); ++it)
01158         {
01159                 if (hash == (*it)->getHash())
01160                 {
01161                         return true;
01162                 }
01163         }
01164         return false;
01165 }
01166 
01172 Assembly* Assembly::getHashOriginal(const wxString& hash) const
01173 {
01174         //search for the same hash and return
01175         for (list<Assembly*>::const_iterator it = m_part.begin(); it != m_part.end(); ++it)
01176         {
01177                 if (!(*it)->isOriginal())
01178                 {
01179                         continue;
01180                 }
01181                 if (!(*it)->isType(IS_OBJECT))
01182                 {
01183                         continue;
01184                 }
01185                 if (hash == (*it)->getHash())
01186                 {
01187                         return (*it);
01188                 }
01189         }
01190         return NULL;
01191 }
01192 
01197 void Assembly::drawShadow()
01198 {
01199         //if hidden, abort draw
01200         if (!m_visible)
01201         {
01202                 return;
01203         }
01204 
01205         //draw shadows, if object visible
01206         glPushMatrix();
01207         {
01208                 //first translate to position
01209                 glTranslatef(m_x, m_y, m_z);
01210 
01211                 //rotate in object center
01212                 glRotatef(m_phi, 1, 0, 0);
01213                 glRotatef(m_theta, 0, 1, 0);
01214                 glRotatef(m_rho, 0, 0, 1);
01215 
01216                 //finally scale on place
01217                 glScalef(m_scale_x, m_scale_y, m_scale_z);
01218 
01219                 if (glIsList(m_dl_shadow))
01220                 {
01221                         //call display list of shadows
01222                         glCallList(m_dl_shadow);
01223                 }
01224                 else
01225                 {
01226                         //create new display list for my shadows
01227                         m_dl_shadow = glGenLists(1);
01228 
01229                         //setup new display list
01230                         glNewList(m_dl_shadow,GL_COMPILE);
01231                         {
01232                                 // draw my shadows to display list
01233                                 for (list<Face>::const_iterator it = m_face.begin(); it != m_face.end(); ++it)
01234                                 {
01235                                         it->draw();
01236                                 }
01237                         }
01238                         glEndList();
01239                 }
01240 
01241                 // draw the children
01242                 for (list<Assembly*>::const_iterator it = m_part.begin(); it != m_part.end(); ++it)
01243                 {
01244                         // draw the Child
01245                         (*it)->drawShadow();
01246                 }
01247         }
01248         glPopMatrix();
01249 }
01250 
01255 void Assembly::putOnGround()
01256 {
01257         m_y = (m_height*m_scale_y)/2.0;
01258 }
01259 
01264 void Assembly::resetOnGround()
01265 {
01266         m_y     = (m_height*m_scale_y)/2.0;
01267         m_phi   = 0.0;
01268         m_theta = 0.0;
01269         m_rho   = 0.0;
01270 }

01272 #if defined(__ATHOS_DEBUG__)
01273 
01277 void Assembly::debugInfo() const
01278 {
01279         wxString msg;
01280         msg << wxT(" x=") << m_x;
01281         msg << wxT(" y=") << m_y;
01282         msg << wxT(" z=") << m_z;
01283         msg << wxT("\nphi=") << m_phi;
01284         msg << wxT(" the=") << m_theta;
01285         msg << wxT(" rho=") << m_rho;
01286         msg << wxT("\nh=") << m_height;
01287         msg << wxT(" w=") << m_width;
01288         msg << wxT(" d=") << m_depth;
01289         msg << wxT("\nsx=") << m_scale_x;
01290         msg << wxT(" sy=") << m_scale_y;
01291         msg << wxT(" sz=") << m_scale_z;
01292         msg << wxT("\noG=") << (m_height * m_scale_y) / 2.0;
01293         wxLogDebug(msg);
01294 }
01295 
01300 void Assembly::dump(wxString str)
01301 {
01302         wxString out(wxEmptyString);
01303         out << str << wxT("-<") << (int)this << wxT("> TYP=") << m_type << wxT(" NAME=") << m_name;
01304 
01305         //dont print smallest parts
01306         if (isType(IS_ATOMIC) || isType(IS_WRAPPER))
01307         {
01308                 return;
01309         }
01310 
01311         //output to debug window
01312         wxLogDebug(out);
01313 
01314         //increase level prefix
01315         str << wxT("-");
01316 
01317         //print ever lower level with +
01318         for (list<Assembly*>::iterator it = m_part.begin(); it != m_part.end(); ++it)
01319         {
01320                 (*it)->dump(str);
01321         }
01322 }
01323 #endif
